prompt_text: When I arrive home (phone connects to home WiFi), check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the bedroom lights to 50% and start my morning playlist. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on the living room lights to 80%, set the thermostat to 72°F, and announce 'Welcome home' on all speakers. If it's after 9 PM, only turn on the hallway light to 20% brightness. Wait 5 seconds after any action, then send a notification confirming what was activated.

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, hallway, living, bedroom
Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, hallway, living, bedroom
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: off, dim, brighten
